document_data.mainbody:
Speak with monsters was an alteration spell that allowed the caster to communicate with any creature that had some mode of communication.
For two minutes per level of experience the caster could speak any creatures language through whatever medium (audio, tactile, pheromones, sign language, dance, empathy, telepathy, etc.) and be able to convey and understand intent, ideas, and concepts up to the complexity the creature was able to grasp. The caster could speak to only one type of creature at a time, but all creatures of the same type within 90 ft (27 m) could understand the caster, within the limitations of the communication medium (pheromones in a high wind might be tricky).
Only verbal and somatic components were required to cast this spell.
